headline: McCarthy refuses to cooperate with Jan. 6 committee, calls probe an abuse of power
author: Farnoush Amiri and Eric Tucker
sentences: WASHINGTON — The House panel investigating the U.S. Capitol insurrection requested an interview and records from House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy on Wednesday, as it continues to seek first-hand details from members of Congress on former President Donald Trump‘s actions on the day hundreds of his supporters brutally beat police, stormed the building and interrupted the certification of the 2020 election.
